title: BloxerBro Parkour
briefDescription: Welcome to BloxerBro Parkour!It's not much of a challenge, but fun to play! Experience the thrill of over 5 levels, from sunny days to the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to BloxerBro Parkour!
It?s not much of a challenge, but fun to play! Experience the thrill of over 5 levels, from sunny days to the nether, to so much more! Challenge your friends!
I recommend watching the trailer! It has cool stuff, things to know before-hand, and clips of other people on YouTube playing the map!
Experience the thrilling experience of parkour, from simple slime stuff, to an entire recreation of the nether! It?s lots of fun!
First level starts out simple and short, slime parkour. It then goes through a couple of levels (play to find out) until you win!
Levels get to progressively more advanced themes and slightly harder parkour.
This is not extremely hard. Some people would probably consider this as a one-shot, but it?ll get updated soon!
(The description may be a bit short and bland, but I don?t have a lot because this map is short. I also want people to get the experience from playing!)

title: Bedrock Multi Use Production Centre/Infinite Super Smelter
briefDescription: Hi all, this is my infinite fuel super smelter. With just a few pulls on a lever and a few pushes of a button, this ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hi all, this is my infinite fuel super smelter. With just a few pulls on a lever and a few pushes of a button, this factory/production centre will produce anything you wish to cook up! To add fuel, just simply press the button at the top for both sweepers and it will collect a ton of fuel for you!
It will even filter it through the system and keep topping up the chests for the auto furnace and smelter.. well theres 2 actually and 2 mni melon and pumpkin farms also being filtered through the system to be stored underneath. This build looks chaotic but i assure you, its noob proof ?
Recommend tick speed to be on 10 for better production rates! Both storage systems are linked together, so if there is no space or even item in the first one, the second one will be there for you! To fill up the furnaces, simply just drop your item of choice into the 2 dispensers, pull the lever and watch your ores (or whatever your smelting) fly up the tube and into the machine! Hope you enjoy this creation and please let me know of any suggestions. Aculos out!

title: Working Plane in Minecraft!
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted to fly a plane in Minecraft? Well now you can! This command block creation was created over many hours and has ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted to fly a plane in Minecraft? Well now you can! This command block creation was created over many hours and has a fully built airport as well.
In this map, you will spawn near the command block area on a glass platform. Below you, you can see the models for the plane. If you continue down the stairs, you will reach the command block area. There, press the button that has a sign saying ?to airport?. You will be teleported to the airport. Keep walking along the path and enter the building to read how to use the plane.
How to control the plane:
Hold the corresponding item that has been placed in your hotbar
Crossbow: makes the plane move forward while on the ground
Trident: makes the plane turn 90 degrees left
Fishing rod: makes the plane turn 90 degrees right
Netherite Helmet: makes the plane move upward while also moving forward
Netherite Boots: makes the plane move downward while also moving forward
Diamond Sword: makes the plane move forward in the air
The plane will automatically glide towards the ground (like in real life) if you are not holding any of the controls.
I?ve created a youtube video of it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oduauHsbDV8

title: Bedrock Auto Sweeping Bamboo Farm
briefDescription: This is my bamboo farm I have been working on. When i get a bit tired of doing terrains, i put bits of time together ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is my bamboo farm I have been working on. When i get a bit tired of doing terrains, i put bits of time together to create this! Apologies it took so long, but here it is! This bamboo farm massively produces bamboo (Very great for using as fuel inside a furnace.. Maybe inside my Auto Furnace and Smelter!) It has a huge storage system for the bamboo underneath of the farm, it is very much needed! I filled up a whole double chest in one run of the sweeper, so i am very happy with this creation. Signs on to advise how to use it, its pretty simple. I also put lamps on it so you know when the loaders have stopped loading ?
Hope you enjoy it and please give me suggestions! Aculos out!

title: Riptide Wars
briefDescription: Welcome to Riptide Wars! This non-automated map takes Minecraft PvP to a new level, with a few maps and a lobby & map select, as well ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Riptide Wars! This non-automated map takes Minecraft PvP to a new level, with a few maps and a lobby & map select, as well as really fun game mechanics with no rules (at least no rules aren?t agreed upon by your 2-5 player party)!
Here are some pictures of the lobby and the new map select:
This is what the spawn looks like:
You have a choice of two settings that affect the gameplay: Weakness & Night Vision

These are some pictures of the original and new maps!
Firstly, the original Riptide Wars map was renamed to the Ruined Cube:
Next, one of the new maps: Pirate Battle!

This one was by far the most detailed and hardest to build. I really hope you enjoy it!
This last map is targeted to those who love simplicity, and minimal detail. It is a very easy map to play in.
It is called the Plain Flats map. Here are some snapshots:
